isis.stitle: HYDRO-MAX™ BRAKE BOOSTER AND MASTER CYLINDER - REMOVE - BACKUP PUMP

svcproc.title: BACKUP PUMP
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 3 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: Block the vehicle wheels, disconnect battery ground cable.
Slide rubber boot (Item 10) from backup pump (Item 11) electrical stud (Item 12). Remove hex nut (Item 13) and remove backup pump power lead (Item 14) from electrical stud.

Place a suitable container under the Hydro-Max™ booster unit to catch power steering fluid while removing backup pump (Item 11) from Hydro-Max™ booster (Item 3). Power steering fluid will drain from the Hydro-Max™ booster when the backup pump is removed.

svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 5 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove two hex flanged bolts (Item 1) securing the backup pump (Item 2) to the Hydro-Max™ booster (Item 3). Remove backup pump and remove and discard the two oval shaped O-rings (Item 4) between the backup pump and Hydro-Max™ booster housing.

figure.caption: Figure 5. Backup Pump and Oval Shaped O-rings
